response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. After careful consideration, we propose a transaction where you can secure this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. We are confident that this offer presents an exceptional opportunity for both parties, ensuring that you receive a high-quality product at a competitive price while allowing us to maximize its worth. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
